content: Karma is never punishment — it is simply cause and effect — this is a very common misunderstandng that fools a lot of people into feeling they are victims of punishment — it is a teaching device — what you send out will come back at you, nothing more and nothing less — be your very best version of yourself all the time and that will come back at you — it is a mirror to hold up and look at yourself deeply through, what is it you are holding inside yourself, even at deepest levels that will be shown back at you so you can never deny anything to yourself if you look at it in this way but you can change how you operate so what comes back at you is what you want it to be. IN my book Trusting your Intuition I explain this is depth and about how to be clear of what you want i.e. don’t send out muddy coloured messages if you want clear colours back. Quite simple really but cleaning up that paint palette, now that takes some work lol
